document.full_text: after being released from a nazi death camp, mr. sempr??n became a u.n. translator and a communist activist, returning to spain in 1953. he was named spanish culture minister from 1988 to '91.
document.title: obituaries: jorge sempr??n, 87, cultural force in spain, dies
